response.overview: HOMESICK: THE DOCUMENTARY, follows Chicago-based rapper and producer, Jay Wood, as he collaborates with the Central State University Invincible Marching Marauders Marching Band for his latest single, HOMESICK. Wood reflects on the challenges of putting this live performance together as an independent artist and how important this moment is to his growth personally and professionally. He explains the process of creating the song back in 2020, reflects on his journey, and looks forward to, one day, being able to enjoy the fruits of his labor.
response.title: Homesick: The Documentary
